high_descs: Move to the dresser on the right
Pick up the CD on the dresser
Turn around and move to the entertainment center on the left
Place the CD on the entertainment center
anns.task_desc: Move the CD from the dresser to the entertainment center

high_descs: Turn left and face the dresser with the clock and other items on it.
Pick the disc up from the dresser.
Go right and then turn right again before turning left to face the brown shelves.
Put the disc on the bottom left shelf.
anns.task_desc: Put a disc on a shelf.

high_descs: Move to the left facing the dresser where the CD is
Pick up the CD in the middle of the dresser
Carry the CD to the wood shelving unit against the wall
Place the CD on the bottom left cubby on the shelf
anns.task_desc: Move a CD to the shelving unit
